roleset.name: become, fall away into flaky pieces

FLAKING-N NOTES: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to flake.01. Flake.01 is a member of VN class carve-21.2. Framed by Katie. (from flaking.01-n)

role.descr: resulting state of arg1, often prepositional

example.name: flake-v: No agent, arg1 as subject
example.text: It flaked into pieces like a broken leaf.

example.name: flake-v: Transitive, with instrument
example.text: The chef flaked the fish into chunks with his hands.

example.name: flake-v: With direction
example.text: If the paint is too brittle and thin, it flakes away within a few years.
example.arg: If the paint is too brittle and thin

example.name: flake-v: With secondary predication
example.text: All nail polish flakes off, so the baby may get it in her mouth.

example.name: flaking-n: eww...
example.text: Excessive scratching has caused flaking of the skin into frosted flakes shaped pieces.
